comment: Sample: msg_id="5501-0010" USB drive format operation was successful
Description: USB drive format operation was %s
Format: USB drive format operation was %s

update.message: $MESSAGE NEOMeta: area="Management / System" name="USB drive format" description="USB drive format operation was %s"

comment: Name: Generate system diagnostic file failed
Sample: msg_id="5501-0014" Generate system diagnostic file to USB drive failed
Description: Generate system diagnostic file to %s failed
Format: Generate system diagnostic file to %s failed
Variables: Generate system diagnostic file to ${device} failed

update.message: $MESSAGE NEOMeta: area="Management / System" name="Generate system diagnostic file failed" description="Generate system diagnostic file to %s failed"

comment: Name: Periodic support snapshot is enabled
Sample: msg_id="5501-0015" System periodic support snapshot is enabled
Description: System periodic support snapshot is enabled
Format: System periodic support snapshot is enabled

update.message: $MESSAGE NEOMeta: area="Management / System" name="Periodic support snapshot is enabled" description="System periodic support snapshot is enabled"

comment: Sample: msg_id="5501-0017" Exported system diagnostic file to server successfully
Description: Exported system diagnostic file to %s successfully
Format: Exported system diagnostic file to %s successfully
Variables: Generate system diagnostic file to ${device} successfully

update.message: $MESSAGE NEOMeta: area="Management / System" name="Generate system diagnostic successfully" description="Exported system diagnostic file to %s successfully"

comment: Name: Reset to the default configuration failed
Sample: msg_id="5501-0018" The default configuration settings were not restored after a system reset.
Description: Reset to the default configuration failed when the device was rebooted.
Format: Reset to the default configuration failed when the device was rebooted.

update.message: $MESSAGE NEOMeta: area="Management / System" name="Reset to the default configuration failed" description="Reset to the default configuration failed when the device was rebooted."

comment: Sample: msg_id="5501-000C" Device auto restore from a specific image in a USB drive disc or normal restore from a normal image failed
Description: Device auto restore from USB drive image failed due to USB drive not found
Format: Device %s restore from %s image failed due to %s
Variables: Device ${restore_type} restore from ${image_source} image failed for ${reason}

update.message: $MESSAGE NEOMeta: area="Management / System" name="Device restore failed" description="Device auto restore from USB drive image failed due to USB drive not found"

comment: Name: Creating USB auto restore image failed
Sample: msg_id="5501-000D" Creation of USB auto restore image failed due to no USB drive
Description: Creation of USB auto restore image failed due to %s
Format: Creation of USB auto restore image failed due to %s
Variables: Creation of USB auto restore image failed: ${reason}

update.message: $MESSAGE NEOMeta: area="Management / System" name="Creating USB auto restore image failed" description="Creation of USB auto restore image failed due to %s"

comment: Sample: msg_id="5501-001B" System backup to USB drive failed due to write file to USB drive error
Description: System backup %s%s failed due to %s.
Format: System backup %s%s failed due to %s.

update.message: $MESSAGE NEOMeta: area="Management / System" name="System backup failed" description="System backup %s%s failed due to %s."

comment: Name: USB auto restore failed reason
Sample: msg_id="5501-001C" USB auto restore failed due to not detect the USB drive
Description: USB auto restore failed due to %s
Format: USB auto restore failed due to %s
Variables: USB auto restore failed for ${reason}

update.message: $MESSAGE NEOMeta: area="Management / System" name="USB auto restore failed reason" description="USB auto restore failed due to %s"

comment: Sample: msg_id="300" A user successfully logged in. The log message specifies the user type, user name, and IP address.
Description: Management user admin from 10.0.1.2 logged in

update.message: $MESSAGE NEOMeta: area="Management / Accounting" name="User login succeeded" description="Management user admin from 10.0.1.2 logged in"

comment: Sample: msg_id="3000-" A user log in attempt failed. The log message specifies the user type, user name, IP address, and the failure reason, if available.
Description: Management user admin from 10.0.1.2 log in attempt was rejected.
Format: %s %s%s%s from %s log in attempt was rejected%s%s%s%s

update.message: $MESSAGE NEOMeta: area="Management / Accounting" name="User login failed" description="Management user admin from 10.0.1.2 log in attempt was rejected."

comment: Sample: msg_id="3000-0" A user successfully logged out. The log message specifies the user type, user name, and IP address.
Description: Management user admin from 10.0.1.2 logged out

update.message: $MESSAGE NEOMeta: area="Management / Accounting" name="User logout" description="Management user admin from 10.0.1.2 logged out"

comment: Sample: msg_id="1100-0003" Authentication server 192.168.1.1:389 is not responding
Description: The external authentication server is not available.
Format: Authentication server %s:%d is not responding

update.message: $MESSAGE NEOMeta: area="Management / Authentication" name="Authentication server unavailable" description="The external authentication server is not available."

comment: Sample: msg_id="1100-0004" The user successfully authenticated. The log message specifies whether this is an administrative user, a firewall user, or another type of user.
Description: Authentication of firewall user [user1@Firebox-DB] from 198.51.100.2 was accepted
Format: Authentication of %s user [%s@%s] from %s was accepted
Variables: Authentication of ${user_type} user [${user_name}@${auth_server}] from ${ipaddr} was accepted.

update.message: $MESSAGE NEOMeta: area="Management / Authentication" name="User authentication succeeded" description="Authentication of firewall user [user1@Firebox-DB] from 198.51.100.2 was accepted"

comment: Sample: msg_id="1100-0005" Authentication of MUVPN user [user1@Firebox-DB] from 198.51.100.2 was rejected, password is incorrect
Description: User authentication failed. The log message specifies the reason.
Format: Authentication of %s user [%s@%s] from %s was rejected, %s
Variables: "Authentication of ${user_type} user [${user_name}@${auth_server}] from ${ip_addr} was rejected, ${reason}"

update.message: $MESSAGE NEOMeta: area="Management / Authentication" name="User authentication failed" description="User authentication failed. The log message specifies the reason."

comment: Sample: msg_id="1100-0006" It indicates a user unlock and how he/she is unlocked
Description: User test is unlocked automatically

update.message: $MESSAGE NEOMeta: area="Management / Authentication" name="User unlock" description="User test is unlocked automatically"

comment: Sample: msg_id="1100-0007" It indicates a user lockout and how and why he/she is locked out
Description: User test is locked out briefly after 3 login failures
Format: User %s is locked out %s after %d login failures
Variables: User ${name} is locked out ${lockout_type} after ${failure_count} login failures

update.message: $MESSAGE NEOMeta: area="Management / Authentication" name="user lock" description="User test is locked out briefly after 3 login failures"

comment: Name: BOVPN TLS client authentication failed
Sample: msg_id="1100-0008" Authentication of BOVPN TLS client [EasternOffice] from 198.51.100.2 was rejected, pre-shared key is incorrect
Description: BOVPN TLS client authentication failed. The log message specifies the reason.
Format: Authentication of BOVPN TLS client [%s] from %s was rejected, %s
Variables: "Authentication of BOVPN TLS client [${client_name}] from ${ip_addr} was rejected, ${reason}"

update.message: $MESSAGE NEOMeta: area="Management / Authentication" name="BOVPN TLS client authentication failed" description="BOVPN TLS client authentication failed. The log message specifies the reason."

comment: Name: Firebox connected to SSO agent
Sample: msg_id="1100-0010" Firebox connected to the SSO agent at 10.0.1.25 successfully.
Description: Firebox connected to the SSO agent successfully
Format: Firebox connected to the SSO agent at %s successfully.

Description: Firebox closed the connection to the SSO agent.

update.message: $MESSAGE NEOMeta: area="Management / Authentication" name="Firebox closed the connection" description="Firebox closed the connection to the SSO agent."

update.message: $MESSAGE NEOMeta: area="Management / Authentication" name="Firebox failed to connect to the SSO agent" description="Firebox failed to connect to the SSO agent."

Format: SSO Agent failover from %s to %s was successful.

update.message: $MESSAGE NEOMeta: area="Management / Authentication" name="Successful SSO agent failover" description="Successful SSO agent failover."

Format: SSO agent failover from %s to %s failed. Reason: %s.

update.message: $MESSAGE NEOMeta: area="Management / Authentication" name="Unsuccessful SSO failover" description="Unsuccessful SSO failover."

comment: Sample: msg_id="1100-000C" Authentication failed. The log message specifies the reason.
Description: Authentication error. Domain not found for user1.

update.message: $MESSAGE NEOMeta: area="Management / Authentication" name="Authentication error" description="Authentication error. Domain not found for user1."

comment: Sample: msg_id="1100-000D" Authentication of user [user1@example.com] failed. Both primary and secondary servers are unavailable.
Description: Authentication failed because both the primary and secondary authentication servers are unavailable.
Format: Authentication of user [%s@%s] failed. Both primary and secondary servers are unavailable.

update.message: $MESSAGE NEOMeta: area="Management / Authentication" name="Groups maximum reached" description="The maximum number of groups (31) has been reached"

update.message: $MESSAGE NEOMeta: area="Management / Configuration" name="Device configuration change" description="The device configuration has been changed."

update.message: $MESSAGE NEOMeta: area="Management / Configuration" name="Administrative accounts reset to default" description="Administrative accounts were reset to the default settings"

update.message: $MESSAGE NEOMeta: area="Management / Configuration" name="Feature expired" description=""

comment: Name: Device configuration update with audit trail

Sample: msg_id="1500-0000" The updated configuration file was successfully sent to the device from the specified Management Server. The log message indicates if the feature key was updated. The log message might also specify the revision ID and includes comments about the update.

Description: The configuration file and feature key for the device were successfully updated after a request from admin from the Management Server at 10.139.44.88. Revision: dummy_config_rev_id. Comments: update tcp segment.
Format: The configuration file %s for the device %s successfully updated after a request from %s from the Management Server at %s.%s%s%s%s.

update.message: $MESSAGE NEOMeta: area="Management / Management Client" name="Device configuration update with audit trail" description="The configuration file and feature key for the device were successfully updated after a request from admin from the Management Server at 10.139.44.88. Revision: dummy_config_rev_id. Comments: update tcp segment."

comment: Sample: msg_id="1500-0001" The device retrieved an updated configuration file from the specified Management Server. The log message also indicates if device retrieved a feature key.
Description: Device configuration file was successfully updated. Configuration file retrieved from the Management Server at 10.139.44.88.
Format: Device configuration file %s successfully updated. Configuration file retrieved from the Management Server at %s.

update.message: $MESSAGE NEOMeta: area="Management / Management Client" name="Device configuration update" description="Device configuration file was successfully updated. Configuration file retrieved from the Management Server at 10.139.44.88."

comment: Sample: msg_id="1501-0000" The IPSec certificate was successfully imported from the Management Server at 10.139.44.88.
Description: The IPsec certificate was successfully imported from the specified Management Server.
Format: The IPSec certificate was successfully imported from the Management Server at %s.

update.message: $MESSAGE NEOMeta: area="Management / Management Client" name="IPSec certificate import" description="The IPsec certificate was successfully imported from the specified Management Server."

comment: Name: Management Server CA certificate import

Description: The Management Server CA certificate was successfully imported from the specified Management Server.
Format: The Management Server CA certificate was successfully imported from the Management Server at %s.

update.message: $MESSAGE NEOMeta: area="Management / Management Client" name="Management Server CA certificate import" description="The Management Server CA certificate was successfully imported from the specified Management Server."

comment: Sample: msg_id="5000-0001" A user log in attempt failed. The log message specifies the UI type, User Name, IP address, and (if available) the failure reason.

Variables: %{ui_type} ${user_name}@${auth_server} from ${ipaddr} log in attempt was rejected ${msg}.
